original_text: He nearly died because he was working to serve Christ. He came to help me, because you could not help me yourselves. He was even ready to die so that he could do that on your behalf.
korean_text: 그가 그리스도의 일을 위하여 죽기에 이르러도 자기 목숨을 돌보지 아니한 것은 나를 섬기는 너희의 일에 부족함을 채우려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: because he was working to serve Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 그리스도를 섬기기 위해 일하고 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: because you could not help me yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 여러분은 스스로 나를 도울 수 없었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: He was even ready to die
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 심지어 죽을 준비까지 되어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: so that he could do that on your behalf
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 여러분을 대신해서 그것을 할 수 있었습니다
